cocktail.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an alcoholic drink made from a mixture of different drinks
cocktail.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a mixture of several things which is dangerous, unpleasant, confusing, or exciting
cocktail.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a lethal cocktail of painkillers and whisky
